original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes skandha:/🔽dharmma dh'a tu bi shuddhi:/🔽a'a darsha dzny'a nama\/🔽sa ma t'a dzny'a nama\/
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes skandha:/ dharmma dh'a tu bi shuddhi:/ a'a darsha dzny'a nama\/ sa ma t'a dzny'a nama\/
translated: The aggregate of the wisdom of liberation.🔽The pure sphere of phenomena.🔽The wisdom of seeing.🔽The wisdom of equality.

original: pra tya beksha na dzny'a nama\/🔽kri ty'anushth'a na dzny'a nama\/
analyzed: pra tya beksha na dzny'a nama\/ kri ty'anushth'a na dzny'a nama\/
translated: The wisdom of discernment.🔽The wisdom of accomplishing activities.🔽The body of truth.🔽The body of perfect enjoyment.

original: dharmma k'a ya:/ sambho ga k'a ya:/🔽nirm'a na k'a ya:/
analyzed: dharmma k'a ya:/ sambho ga k'a ya:/ nirm'a na k'a ya:/

original: (de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ming la/) sth'a n'a sth'a na dzny'a na ba lama\/
analyzed: (de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ming la/) sth'a n'a sth'a na dzny'a na ba lama\/
translated: (The names of the ten powers of the tathagatas:) The power of knowledge of what is and is not possible.

original: mthong ba'i phung po /
analyzed: mthong ba'i phung po /

original: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag ba /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag ba /

analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes /

analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes /

original: bya ba nan tan du grub pa'i ye shes /
analyzed: bya ba nan tan du grub pa'i ye shes /

original: chos kyi sku /🔽longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
analyzed: chos kyi sku / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
translated: Body of truth.🔽Body of perfect enjoyment.

original: sprul pa'i sku /
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku /

original: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
analyzed: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
translated: The power of knowledge of what is and is not possible.

original: @3b karma pi p'a ka dzny'a na ba lam\/
analyzed: @3b karma pi p'a ka dzny'a na ba lam\/
translated: The power of knowledge of the ripening of karma.🔽The power of knowledge of various inclinations.🔽The power of knowledge of various elements.🔽The power of knowledge of superior and inferior faculties.

original: n'a n'a bi mukti dzny'a na ba lam\/
analyzed: n'a n'a bi mukti dzny'a na ba lam\/
translated: The power of knowledge of the path that goes everywhere.🔽The power of knowledge of the absorptions, liberations, concentrations, and attainments.🔽The power of knowledge of the recollection of past lives.🔽The power of knowledge of death and rebirth.🔽The power of knowledge of the exhaustion of defilements.

original: n'a n'a dh'a tu dzny'a na ba lam\/
analyzed: n'a n'a dh'a tu dzny'a na ba lam\/

original: aindri ya pa r'a pa ra dzny'a na ba lam\/🔽sarba tra g'a mi n'i pra ti pantha dzny'a na ba lam\/
analyzed: aindri ya pa r'a pa ra dzny'a na ba lam\/ sarba tra g'a mi n'i pra ti pantha dzny'a na ba lam\/

original: sarba dhy'a na bi mo ksha sa m'a dhi sa m'a patti las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /🔽mos pa sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
analyzed: sarba dhy'a na bi mo ksha sa m'a dhi sa m'a patti las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs / mos pa sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
translated: The power of knowing the ripening of karma,🔽The power of knowing the various aspirations,

original: khams sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
analyzed: khams sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
translated: The power of knowing the various dhātus,

original: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
analyzed: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
translated: The power of knowing the higher and lower faculties,

original: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs /
analyzed: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs /
translated: The power of knowing all paths and their destinations,

original: bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms sam kle sha bya ba d'a na byutth'a na dzny'a na ba lam\/🔽p'urba ni b'a s'a nu smri ti dzny'a na ba lam\/
analyzed: bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms sam kle sha bya ba d'a na byutth'a na dzny'a na ba lam\/ p'urba ni b'a s'a nu smri ti dzny'a na ba lam\/
translated: The power of knowing the absorptions, liberations, samādhis, and samāpattis,🔽The power of remembering past lives,

original: tsyu tyu pa patti dzny'a na ba lam\/
analyzed: tsyu tyu pa patti dzny'a na ba lam\/
translated: The power of knowing deaths and rebirths,

original: a'a sra baksha ya dzny'a na ba lam\/
analyzed: a'a sra baksha ya dzny'a na ba lam\/
translated: The power of knowing the destruction of defilements,

original: (de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ming la/) sarba dharmm'a bhi sambo dhi bee sh'a ra dyam /
analyzed: (de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ming la/) sarba dharmm'a bhi sambo dhi bee sh'a ra dyam /
translated: (The Names of the Four Fearlessnesses of the Tathāgata)

original: par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs /
analyzed: par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs /
translated: The power of omniscience of all the afflictions, purification, and arising of all phenomena.

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
translated: The power of knowing the recollection of past abodes.

original: shi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs /
analyzed: shi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs /
translated: The power of knowing death and rebirth.

original: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
analyzed: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs /
translated: The power of knowing the exhaustion of defilements.

original: chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa /
translated: Fearlessness in fully and completely awakening to all phenomena.

original: sarb'a sra baksha ya dzny'a na bee sh'a ra dyam\/
analyzed: sarb'a sra baksha ya dzny'a na bee sh'a ra dyam\/
translated: The knowledge of the destruction of all defilements.🔽Fearlessness in teaching the obstacles to the path.

original: aanta r'a yi ka dharmm'a na n+ya th'a tva nishtsi ta by'a ka ra na bee sh'a ra dyam\/🔽sarba samba da dhi ga m'a ya neerya ni ka pra ti patt'a th'a tva bee sh'a ra dyam\/
analyzed: aanta r'a yi ka dharmm'a na n+ya th'a tva nishtsi ta by'a ka ra na bee sh'a ra dyam\/🔽sarba samba da dhi ga m'a ya neerya ni ka pra ti patt'a th'a tva bee sh'a ra dyam\/
translated: Fearlessness in teaching the path to liberation.

original: (sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ming la/) zag pa thams cad zad par mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa /
analyzed: (sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ming la/) zag pa thams cad zad par mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa /
translated: Fearlessness in knowing the exhaustion of all defilements

original: bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa /
analyzed: bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa /
translated: Fearlessness in declaring the dharmas that are obstacles to be irreversible

original: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa /
translated: Fearlessness in declaring the path of definite deliverance that will lead to the attainment of all that is perfect

original: @4a * // n'a sti ta th'a ga ta syaskha li tam\/
analyzed: @4a * // n'a sti ta th'a ga ta syaskha li tam\/
translated: There is no stammering in the Tathāgata

original: n'asti ra bi tam\/🔽n'asti mu shi ta smri ti t'a /
analyzed: n'asti ra bi tam\/ n'asti mu shi ta smri ti t'a /
translated: There is no life🔽There is no forgetfulness or absentmindedness

original: n'astya sa m'a hi ta tsittam /🔽n'asti n'a n'a tva sam dzny'a /
analyzed: n'astya sa m'a hi ta tsittam / n'asti n'a n'a tva sam dzny'a /
translated: There is no unconcentrated mind🔽There is no different kind of knowledge

original: n'astya pra ti sam khy'a yo peksh'a /🔽n'asti tstshanda sya h'a ni:/🔽n'asti b'irya sya h'a ni:/
analyzed: n'astya pra ti sam khy'a yo peksh'a / n'asti tstshanda sya h'a ni:/ n'asti b'irya sya h'a ni:/
translated: There is no difference in his view🔽There is no loss of zeal🔽There is no loss of heroism

original: n'asti smri ti h'a ni:/
analyzed: n'asti smri ti h'a ni:/
translated: There is no loss of mindfulness

original: * // de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa /🔽ca co med pa /
analyzed: * // de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa / ca co med pa /

original: bsnyel ba med pa /
analyzed: bsnyel ba med pa /
translated: The Tathāgata has no life🔽The Tathāgata has no forgetfulness or absentmindedness

original: sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa /
analyzed: sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa /
translated: The Tathāgata has no unconcentrated mind

original: tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa /
translated: He is without the perception of multiplicity.

original: so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa /
analyzed: so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa /
translated: He is without the indifference of not investigating.

original: 'dun pa nyams pa med pa /
analyzed: 'dun pa nyams pa med pa /
translated: He is without the decline of aspiration.

original: brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa /🔽dran pa nyams pa med pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa / dran pa nyams pa med pa /
translated: He is without the decline of effort.

original: n'asti sa m'a dherh'a ni:/🔽n'asti pra dzny'a y'arh'a ni:/🔽n'asti pi mukterh'a ni:/🔽sarba k'a ya karma dzny'a na p'urbam ga mam dzny'a n'a nu pa ri bartt'i /🔽sarba b'akkarma dzny'a na p'urbam ga mam dzny'a n'a nu pa ri bartt'i /
analyzed: n'asti sa m'a dherh'a ni:/ n'asti pra dzny'a y'arh'a ni:/ n'asti pi mukterh'a ni:/ sarba k'a ya karma dzny'a na p'urbam ga mam dzny'a n'a nu pa ri bartt'i / sarba b'akkarma dzny'a na p'urbam ga mam dzny'a n'a nu pa ri bartt'i /
translated: He is without the decline of mindfulness.

original: sarba ma na skarm'a dzny'a na p'urbam ga mam dzny'a n'a ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa /
analyzed: sarba ma na skarm'a dzny'a na p'urbam ga mam dzny'a n'a ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa /
translated: He is without the decline of meditative stabilization.

original: shes rab nyams pa med pa /
analyzed: shes rab nyams pa med pa /
translated: He is without the decline of wisdom.

original: rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa /🔽lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba /
translated: He is without the decline of liberation.🔽All his physical actions are preceded by wisdom and follow after wisdom.

original: ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba /
analyzed: ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba /
translated: All his verbal actions are preceded by wisdom and follow after wisdom.🔽All his mental actions are preceded by wisdom and follow after wisdom.

original: yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing nu pa ri bartt'i /🔽aa t'i te dhya n'a sam ga ma pra ti ha tam dzny'a na darsha nam pra brta te /
analyzed: yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing nu pa ri bartt'i / aa t'i te dhya n'a sam ga ma pra ti ha tam dzny'a na darsha nam pra brta te /
translated: All his mental actions are preceded by and follow after pristine awareness.🔽He is endowed with the vision of pristine awareness that is applied to the present.

original: aa n'a ga te dhva n+ya sam ga ma pra ti ha tram dzny'a na darsha nam pra brta te /🔽pra tyutpanna dhva n+ya sam ga ma pra ti ha tam dzny'a na darsha nam pra bartta te /
analyzed: aa n'a ga te dhva n+ya sam ga ma pra ti ha tram dzny'a na darsha nam pra brta te / pra tyutpanna dhva n+ya sam ga ma pra ti ha tam dzny'a na darsha nam pra bartta te /
translated: He is endowed with the vision of pristine awareness that is applied to the past.🔽He is endowed with the vision of pristine awareness that is applied to the future.🔽He is endowed with the vision of pristine awareness that is applied to the present.

original: (de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ming la/) ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba /🔽'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa /🔽ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa /
analyzed: (de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ming la/) ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa /
translated: (The thirty-two names of the Tathāgata’s great compassion are as follows:)🔽He is endowed with the vision of pristine awareness that is applied to the past without attachment or obstruction.🔽He is endowed with the vision of pristine awareness that is applied to the future without attachment or obstruction.

original: da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa /
analyzed: da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa /
translated: He is endowed with the vision of pristine awareness that is applied to the present without attachment or obstruction.

original: @4b ni r'atm'a na ssarba dharm'a:satv'a shtsa nee r'atmy'am n'a dhi mutsyante aa tasta th'a ga ta sya sa tve shu ma h'a ka ru no tpa dya te /🔽ni: satv'a: sarba dharmm'a:/🔽ni dz'i b'a:sarba dharmm'a:/🔽nishpung+ga l'a: sarba dharmm'a:/🔽aa bh'a b'a:sarba dharmm'a:/

original: chos thams cad ni bdag med pa yin na sems can rnams bdag med par ma mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o //🔽chos thams cad ni sems can med pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni bdag med pa yin na sems can rnams bdag med par ma mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o // chos thams cad ni sems can med pa /
translated: 1. All dharmas are without a self, and yet beings do not understand that they are without a self. Therefore, the Tathagata generates great compassion for beings.🔽All dharmas are without a self.

original: chos thams cad ni srog med pa /🔽chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa /🔽chos thams cad ni rang bzhin med aa ni ke t'a:sarba dharmm'a:/
analyzed: chos thams cad ni srog med pa / chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa / chos thams cad ni rang bzhin med aa ni ke t'a:sarba dharmm'a:/
translated: All dharmas are without a being.🔽All dharmas are without a soul.🔽All dharmas are without an individual.

original: aa n'a la y'a:sarba dharmm'a:/🔽aa ma m'a:sarba dharmm'a:/
analyzed: aa n'a la y'a:sarba dharmm'a:/ aa ma m'a:sarba dharmm'a:/
translated: All dharmas are without an inherent nature.🔽All dharmas are without a cause.

original: aa shv'a mi k'a:sarba dharmm'a:/
analyzed: aa shv'a mi k'a:sarba dharmm'a:/
translated: All dharmas are without a source.🔽All dharmas are without a basis.🔽All dharmas are without a support.

original: aa ba stu k'a:sarba dharmm'a:/

original: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod sems kyi tha ba dang zhe sdang la zhugs par gzigs /
analyzed: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod sems kyi tha ba dang zhe sdang la zhugs par gzigs /
translated: Alas! He sees that the beings in the world are caught up in mutual conflict and are hardened by malice and hatred.

original: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa yukto ba t'a yam lo ka sanni be sho bi sha ma m'arga pra y'a ta:autpa tha m'argasth'a y'i /🔽lubdho l'a s'a bhi bh'u to ba t'a yam lo ka sanni be sha:/🔽aa tripta: pa ratsi du pa h'a r'i /
analyzed: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa yukto ba t'a yam lo ka sanni be sho bi sha ma m'arga pra y'a ta:autpa tha m'argasth'a y'i / lubdho l'a s'a bhi bh'u to ba t'a yam lo ka sanni be sha:/ aa tripta: pa ratsi du pa h'a r'i /
translated: Alas, this world is caught up in mutual conflict and is immersed in the harshness and hatred of malice.

original: dha na dh'a n+ya gri ha pu tra bh'ary'a trishn'a d'a s'a ba te me satv'a aa s'a re s'a ra 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan zhing lam nyam nga bar zhugs pa lam gol ba la gnas pa /
analyzed: dha na dh'a n+ya gri ha pu tra bh'ary'a trishn'a d'a s'a ba te me satv'a aa s'a re s'a ra 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan zhing lam nyam nga bar zhugs pa lam gol ba la gnas pa /
translated: Alas, this world is mistaken, for it has entered a bad path and abides in a wrong path.

original: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pas zil gyis non pa ste chog mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa /
analyzed: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pas zil gyis non pa ste chog mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa /
translated: Alas, this world is overcome by greed, for it is insatiable and robs others of their wealth.🔽Alas, this world is attached to the objects of desire, for it is attached to the objects of desire and is attached to the objects of desire.

original: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nor dang 'bru dang khyim dang bu dang chung ma la sred pas 'khol ba ste snying po sam dznyi na:/
analyzed: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nor dang 'bru dang khyim dang bu dang chung ma la sred pas 'khol ba ste snying po sam dznyi na:/
translated: Alas! These beings are tormented by craving for wealth, grain, houses, children, and spouses.🔽

original: bi sha m'a dz'i b'a ba te me satv'a aa n+yonyan+ya pa ri banytsa no pasthi t'a:/🔽aa tript'a pa te me sa tv'a l'a bha satk'a ra shlo ko pa tsa ri t'a:/
analyzed: bi sha m'a dz'i b'a ba te me satv'a aa n+yonyan+ya pa ri banytsa no pasthi t'a:/ aa tript'a pa te me sa tv'a l'a bha satk'a ra shlo ko pa tsa ri t'a:/
translated: Alas, these beings are tormented by craving for wealth, grain, houses, sons, and wives, yet they perceive what is essenceless as having an essence.

original: tript'a sma ai ti pra ti dz'a na te /
analyzed: tript'a sma ai ti pra ti dz'a na te /
translated: They are not satisfied with their wives,🔽yet they are attached to other people's wives.

original: na ty'a bhi ra t'a ba te me med pa la snying por 'du shes pa /🔽kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mi rigs pas 'tsho ba ste gcig la gcig 'drid pas gnas pa /
analyzed: na ty'a bhi ra t'a ba te me med pa la snying por 'du shes pa / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mi rigs pas 'tsho ba ste gcig la gcig 'drid pas gnas pa /
translated: They are not satisfied with their own wives,🔽yet they are attached to other people's wives.🔽They are not satisfied with their own wives,

original: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang /
analyzed: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang /
translated: yet they are attached to other people's wives.

original: bdag ni chog shes pa'o snyam du 'dzin /
analyzed: bdag ni chog shes pa'o snyam du 'dzin /
translated: They are not satisfied with their own wives,🔽yet they are attached to other people's wives.

original: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim @5b satv'a ae k'ant'a klisht du:kha bh'a dza ne gri h'a b'a se k'a ra no pa ga:pu na: sarba dharmm'a bi tha pa na pra tyu pasth'a na laksha n'a:/🔽ai dam pu na ra gra ma sam ga dzny'a na mu t+sri dzya bi shishta pa ri nirb'a na /

translated: Alas! These beings are attached to their homes, to their wives and children, to their friends and relatives, to their possessions. original: tam sa tr'a h'i na y'a nam pr'artha yante ya di dam gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod kun nas nyon mongs pa can la rtag tu dga' ba chos thams cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ba ste sgrub pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: tam sa tr'a h'i na y'a nam pr'artha yante ya di dam gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod kun nas nyon mongs pa can la rtag tu dga' ba chos thams cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ba ste sgrub pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Alas! These beings are always attached to the abode of the house, which is a vessel of suffering, and is the cause of the forest of existence. All phenomena are characterized by being produced by causes and by being established by causes.

original: sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su /
analyzed: sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su /
translated: The highest wisdom of beings is distinguished by being free from attachment.🔽They seek it, if they desire the highest nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing gang 'di nyan shr'a ba ka pra tye ka buddha y'a n'am te bhya au d'a re ma ti ro tsa yishy'a m'i ti ya di dam buddham dzny'a n'a dhy'a lam ba na t'a yee ai tvi ta th'a ga ta sya
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing gang 'di nyan shr'a ba ka pra tye ka buddha y'a n'am te bhya au d'a re ma ti ro tsa yishy'a m'i ti ya di dam buddham dzny'a n'a dhy'a lam ba na t'a yee ai tvi ta th'a ga ta sya
translated: Having abandoned this nirvāṇa, he thinks, I will seek the welfare of those who are intent on the inferior vehicles of the Śrāvakas and Pratyekabuddhas, and I will cause them to aspire to the vast [path] in order to attain the wisdom of the Buddhas. Thus, the Great Compassion of the Tathāgata

original: sa tve shu ma h'a ka ru notpadya te /
analyzed: sa tve shu ma h'a ka ru notpadya te /

original: (ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyi ming la/) shu shr'usha m'a ne shu sa ma tsitta t'a /🔽aa shu thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyi de dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs🔽pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o //🔽gus par nyan pa rnams la sems snyoms pa /
analyzed: (ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyi ming la/) shu shr'usha m'a ne shu sa ma tsitta t'a / aa shu thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyi de dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o // gus par nyan pa rnams la sems snyoms pa /
translated: (The three types of unique close mindfulness are:)

original: gus par shr'usha m'a ne shu sa ma tsitta t'a /
analyzed: gus par shr'usha m'a ne shu sa ma tsitta t'a /
translated: 1. Having an impartial mind towards those who listen respectfully.🔽2. Having an impartial mind towards those who listen respectfully.

original: shu shr'usha m'a na shu shr'usha m'a ne shu sa ma tsitta t'a /
analyzed: shu shr'usha m'a na shu shr'usha m'a ne shu sa ma tsitta t'a /

original: (bsrung ba med pa bzhi'i ming la/) pa ri shuddha k'a ya sa mu d'a ts'a rasta th'a ga ta:/🔽n'asti ta th'a ga ta sy'a ba ri shuddha k'a ya sa mu d'a ts'a ra t'a /🔽ba ri shuddha b'aksa  mu d'a ts'a rasta mi nyan pa rnams la sems snyoms pa /
analyzed: (bsrung ba med pa bzhi'i ming la/) pa ri shuddha k'a ya sa mu d'a ts'a rasta th'a ga ta:/ n'asti ta th'a ga ta sy'a ba ri shuddha k'a ya sa mu d'a ts'a ra t'a / ba ri shuddha b'aksa  mu d'a ts'a rasta mi nyan pa rnams la sems snyoms pa /
translated: Translation: an even mind towards those who listen respectfully and those who do not;

original: gus par nyan pa dang gus par mi nyan pa rnams la sems snyoms pa /
analyzed: gus par nyan pa dang gus par mi nyan pa rnams la sems snyoms pa /
translated: an even mind towards those who listen respectfully and those who do not;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: the Tathāgata’s completely pure activity of body;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i phrin las yongs su ma dag pa med pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i phrin las yongs su ma dag pa med pa /
translated: the Tathāgata has no impure activity of body;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi phrin las kyi @6a * //🔽th'a ga ta:/ n'asti ta th'a ga ta sy'a pa ri shuddha b'aksa mu d'a ts'a ra t'a /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi phrin las kyi @6a * // th'a ga ta:/ n'asti ta th'a ga ta sy'a pa ri shuddha b'aksa mu d'a ts'a ra t'a /
translated: the Tathāgata’s completely pure activity of speech;🔽the Tathāgata has no impure activity of speech;

original: pa ri shuddha ma na: sa mu d'a ts'a rasta th'a ga ta:/
analyzed: pa ri shuddha ma na: sa mu d'a ts'a rasta th'a ga ta:/
translated: the Tathāgata’s completely pure activity of mind;

original: n'asti ta th'a ga ta sy'a ba ri shuddha ma na: sa mu d'a ts'a ra t'a /🔽pa ri * //
analyzed: n'asti ta th'a ga ta sy'a ba ri shuddha ma na: sa mu d'a ts'a ra t'a / pa ri * //
translated: 1. The Tathagata has pure conduct of speech.

original: spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: 2. The Tathagata has pure conduct of mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa med pa /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa med pa / de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: 3. The Tathagata has no impure conduct of speech.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa med do //
translated: 4. The Tathagata has no impure conduct of mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs shuddha dz'i basta th'a ga ta:/
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs shuddha dz'i basta th'a ga ta:/

original: n'asti ta th'a ga ta sy'a pa ri shuddha dz'i ba t'a /
analyzed: n'asti ta th'a ga ta sy'a pa ri shuddha dz'i ba t'a /
translated: 6. The Tathagata has no impure livelihood.🔽1. Dharmapratisamvit🔽2. Arthapratisamvit🔽3. Niruktipratisamvit🔽4. Pratibhānapratisamvit

original: (so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ming la/) dharma pra ti sampit\/🔽aartha pra ti sambit\/
analyzed: (so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ming la/) dharma pra ti sampit\/ aartha pra ti sambit\/

analyzed: ni rukti pra ti sambit\/

original: pra ti bh'a na pra ti sambit\//
analyzed: pra ti bh'a na pra ti sambit\//

analyzed: (mngon par shes pa lnga'i ming la/) di byam tsakshu:/🔽ba la 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ste /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa med do //
translated: The Tathagata has no impure livelihood.

original: chos so so yang dag par rig pa /
analyzed: chos so so yang dag par rig pa /

original: don so so yang dag par rig pa /
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pa /

original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa /

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa /
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa /

original: lha'i spyan / di byam shro tram\/
analyzed: lha'i spyan / di byam shro tram\/

original: pa ra tsitta dzny'a nam /🔽tse ta: par++y'a ya dzny'a nam /🔽p'urba ni b'a s'a nu smri ti dzny'a nam /
analyzed: pa ra tsitta dzny'a nam / tse ta: par++y'a ya dzny'a nam / p'urba ni b'a s'a nu smri ti dzny'a nam /
translated: the knowledge of others' minds,🔽the knowledge of the categories of mind,🔽the knowledge of the recollection of past lives,

original: ri ddhi bi dhi dzny'a nam /🔽a'a sra baksha ya dzny'a nam /
analyzed: ri ddhi bi dhi dzny'a nam / a'a sra baksha ya dzny'a nam /
translated: the knowledge of the performance of miracles,🔽and the knowledge of the exhaustion of the contaminants.

original: (mngon par shes pa drug gi skabs nas 'byung ba'i ming la/) ya th'a sa m'a hi te tsitte sva ye a'a sa nenyanta rhi ta:/
analyzed: (mngon par shes pa drug gi skabs nas 'byung ba'i ming la/) ya th'a sa m'a hi te tsitte sva ye a'a sa nenyanta rhi ta:/
translated: The six higher perceptions: The mind that is concentrated and well-developed,

original: bi h'a lha'i snyan /
analyzed: bi h'a lha'i snyan /

original: pha rol gyi sems shes pa /
analyzed: pha rol gyi sems shes pa /

original: sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa /
analyzed: sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa /

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa /
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa /
translated: The knowledge of the recollection of past lives,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa /

original: zag pa zad pa shes pa /
analyzed: zag pa zad pa shes pa /
translated: And the knowledge of the exhaustion of the contaminants.

original: ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa bzhin du bdag gi stan gyi steng du mi snang bar 'gyur /🔽@6b ya sya bhyungga mya tsa turbi dha m'iry'a pa tham kalpa ya ti /🔽au pa ri ma:k'a ya:pra dzva la ti /🔽aa dha:k'a y'at sh'i ta l'a b'a ri dh'a r'a:syandante /🔽aa ne ka bi dha mriddhi bi sha yam pra tya nu bha ba ti /🔽ae ko bh'u tv'a ba hu dh'a bha ba ti /🔽ba hu dh'a bh'u tv'a ae ko bha ba ti /
analyzed: ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa bzhin du bdag gi stan gyi steng du mi snang bar 'gyur / @6b ya sya bhyungga mya tsa turbi dha m'iry'a pa tham kalpa ya ti / au pa ri ma:k'a ya:pra dzva la ti / aa dha:k'a y'at sh'i ta l'a b'a ri dh'a r'a:syandante / aa ne ka bi dha mriddhi bi sha yam pra tya nu bha ba ti / ae ko bh'u tv'a ba hu dh'a bha ba ti / ba hu dh'a bh'u tv'a ae ko bha ba ti /
translated: Just as he has settled his mind, he will disappear from his seat.🔽He will perform the four modes of conduct in the sky:🔽He will be a renunciant,🔽with a body that is cool to the touch,

analyzed: dyu tirdha ba ti nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed /
translated: experiencing the various miracles of psychic power,🔽with a single body having many voices,🔽with many bodies having a single voice,🔽with a single voice filling the sky,

original: mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur /
analyzed: mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur /
translated: with a single body filling the sky,🔽with

original: snang bar 'gyur ti ro dh'a na ma pi pra tya nu bha ba ti /🔽ti ra:ku tyam /🔽ti ra:pr'a k'a ram:/🔽parba ta ma pya sangga ma no gatstsha ti /🔽a'a k'a she pi kra ma te tadya th'a paksh'i sha ku ni:/🔽pri thi by'a munmadzdz'a ni nam ka ro ti tadya th'a pi n'a mo da ke /🔽au da ke pya bhi dya m'a no gatstsha zhing mi snang bar yang 'gyur /🔽rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro /
analyzed: snang bar 'gyur ti ro dh'a na ma pi pra tya nu bha ba ti / ti ra:ku tyam / ti ra:pr'a k'a ram:/ parba ta ma pya sangga ma no gatstsha ti / a'a k'a she pi kra ma te tadya th'a paksh'i sha ku ni:/ pri thi by'a munmadzdz'a ni nam ka ro ti tadya th'a pi n'a mo da ke / au da ke pya bhi dya m'a no gatstsha zhing mi snang bar yang 'gyur / rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro /
translated: He will become visible and invisible at will.🔽He will pass through walls.

original: ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro /
analyzed: ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro /

original: ri la yang mi thogs par 'gro /🔽nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no //
analyzed: ri la yang mi thogs par 'gro / nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no //
translated: He will go unhindered through mountains,🔽through the sky,🔽and through the earth, just as through space.

original: sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang byi'u zul byed de dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang byi'u zul byed de dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no //
translated: He will be able to walk on water without sinking, just as on dry land.🔽He will be able to sit cross-legged in space, just as on the ground.🔽He will be able to touch and stroke with his hand the moon and sun, so mighty and powerful,

original: chu la yang mi nub par 'gro ste ti tadya th'a pi n'a ma ma h'a pri thi by'am /
analyzed: chu la yang mi nub par 'gro ste ti tadya th'a pi n'a ma ma h'a pri thi by'am /
translated: and go about in the Brahma world.

original: dh'u m'a ya tya pi pra dzva la tya pi n'a ma ma h'agni skandha:/🔽sva k'a y'a da pi ma h'a b'a ri dh'a r'a aut+sri dza ti tadya th'a pi n'a ma ma h'a me gha:/
analyzed: dh'u m'a ya tya pi pra dzva la tya pi n'a ma ma h'agni skandha:/ sva k'a y'a da pi ma h'a b'a ri dh'a r'a aut+sri dza ti tadya th'a pi n'a ma ma h'a me gha:/
translated: And like a great earth, he is called the great earth.🔽And like a great mountain, he is called the great mountain.🔽And like a great ocean, he is called the great ocean.🔽And like a great sun, he is called the great sun.🔽And like a great moon, he is called the great moon.

original: y'a bhirb'a ri dh'a r'a bhi ra yam tri s'a ha sra ma h'a s'a ha sro lo ka dh'a tu r'a d'ipta: dper nas chen po la bya ba bzhin no //🔽du ba 'thul bar yang byed 'bar bar yang byed de dper na me'i phung po bzhin no //
analyzed: y'a bhirb'a ri dh'a r'a bhi ra yam tri s'a ha sra ma h'a s'a ha sro lo ka dh'a tu r'a d'ipta: dper nas chen po la bya ba bzhin no // du ba 'thul bar yang byed 'bar bar yang byed de dper na me'i phung po bzhin no //

analyzed: bdag gi lus las kyang chu'i rgyun chen po 'byin te dper na sprin chen po bzhin no //
translated: And like a great wind, he is called the great wind.🔽And like a great earth, he is called the great earth.🔽And like a great mountain, he is called the great mountain.🔽And like a great ocean, he is called the great ocean.

translated: And like a great sun, he is called the great sun.🔽And like a great moon, he is called the great moon.

original: y'a badpra hma lo k'a da pi satv'am k'a ye na ba she * //
analyzed: y'a badpra hma lo k'a da pi satv'am k'a ye na ba she * //
translated: Ah! The moon and the sun, the two great luminaries, are like a pair of golden fishes in the sky, and the world is their pond.🔽 And he said, I am the great fish in the pond of the world, the great fish in the pond of the world.

analyzed: ste ; mes rab tu 'bar zhing 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa zhi bar byed do //

analyzed: p'urbba ni b'a sa ma nusma ra tisma /

analyzed: chos thams cad la the tshom med pa'i ye shes mnga' ba /

original: blo spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa /
analyzed: blo spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa /

original: chos mkhyen pa la nem nur med pa /🔽aa bi kalpi ta sha r'i ram:/
analyzed: chos mkhyen pa la nem nur med pa / aa bi kalpi ta sha r'i ram:/
translated: He is free of doubt regarding the knowledge of phenomena.🔽He is free of doubt.

original: sarba bo dhi satva sam pra t'itstsha dzny'a na:/
analyzed: sarba bo dhi satva sam pra t'itstsha dzny'a na:/
translated: He is the one who has attained the perfection of the nondual buddha abode.🔽He has attained the wisdom of the undifferentiated liberation of the tathagatas.

original: aa dva ya buddha bi h'a ra pa ra ma p'a ra mi ta pr'apta:/🔽aa sam bhinna ta th'a ga ta bi mo ksha dzny'a na nishth'a ga ta:/
analyzed: aa dva ya buddha bi h'a ra pa ra ma p'a ra mi ta pr'apta:/ aa sam bhinna ta th'a ga ta bi mo ksha dzny'a na nishth'a ga ta:/
translated: He is the one who has attained the wisdom of the infinite middle.

original: aa nanta ma dhya rnam par ma brtag pa'i sku mnga' ba /
analyzed: aa nanta ma dhya rnam par ma brtag pa'i sku mnga' ba /
translated: He possesses the body of nonconceptualization.

original: ye shes byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par mnos pa /
analyzed: ye shes byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par mnos pa /
translated: He is the one who has taken up the wisdom of all bodhisattvas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa brnyes pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa brnyes pa /
translated: He is the one who has attained the perfection of the nondual buddha abode.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa'i rnam par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa'i rnam par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa /
translated: He is the one who has attained the wisdom of the undifferentiated activities of the tathagatas.

original: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i buddha bh'u mi sa ma t'a dhi ga ta:/🔽dharmma dh'a tu paryanta:/
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i buddha bh'u mi sa ma t'a dhi ga ta:/ dharmma dh'a tu paryanta:/
translated: the end of the future,🔽the Tathagata, the cause of merit,🔽the non-destruction of the roots of virtue,🔽the adornment of patience,🔽the treasure of merit,🔽the ornament of the world,

original: a'a k'a sha dh'a tu parya ba s'a na:/🔽aa pa r'anta ko ti nishtha:/
analyzed: a'a k'a sha dh'a tu parya ba s'a na:/ aa pa r'anta ko ti nishtha:/
translated: the benefactor,🔽the one who has the marks of a great being,🔽the one who has the thirty-two marks,

original: ni shyanda:sa ta th'a ga ta: pu ny'a n'am /
analyzed: ni shyanda:sa ta th'a ga ta: pu ny'a n'am /

original: aa bi pra n'a sha: ku sha la m'u l'a n'am /🔽aa lam kri ta:ksh'anty'a /
analyzed: aa bi pra n'a sha: ku sha la m'u l'a n'am / aa lam kri ta:ksh'anty'a /
translated: the one who has the four forms of fearlessness,🔽the one who has the eighteen special qualities of a buddha,🔽the one who has the seven aspects of enlightenment,🔽the one who has the eightfold noble path,

original: a'a la ya:pu nya ni sangs rgyas kyi sa mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa /
analyzed: a'a la ya:pu nya ni sangs rgyas kyi sa mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa /

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi gtugs pa /🔽nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi gtugs pa / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa /

original: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa de bsod nams dag gi rgyu mthun pa /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa / de bzhin gshegs pa de bsod nams dag gi rgyu mthun pa /
translated: the one who has the four perfect abandonments,🔽the one who has the four legs of manifestation,🔽the one who has the five spiritual faculties,🔽the one who has the five strengths,🔽the one who has the seven limbs of enlightenment,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba /
translated: the one who has the noble eightfold path,🔽the one who has the three forms of knowledge,🔽the one who has the three forms of insight,

original: bzod pas brgyan pa /
analyzed: bzod pas brgyan pa /
translated: the one who has the three forms of patience,🔽the one who has the three forms of liberation,

original: bsod nams kyi gter @10a * //🔽dh'a n'an'am / tsi tri to& nu byanydza nee:/
analyzed: bsod nams kyi gter @10a * // dh'a n'an'am / tsi tri to& nu byanydza nee:/

original: ku su mi to laksha nee:/
analyzed: ku su mi to laksha nee:/
translated: the one who has the three forms of knowledge,🔽the one who has the three forms of knowledge,🔽the one who has the three forms of knowledge,🔽the one who has the three forms of knowledge,🔽the one who has the three forms of knowledge,🔽the one who has the three forms of knowledge,🔽the one who has the three forms of knowledge,🔽the one who has the three forms of knowledge,🔽the one who has the three forms of knowledge,🔽the one who has the three forms of knowledge,🔽the one who has the three forms of knowledge,

original: pra t'i r'u po go tsa re na //
analyzed: pra t'i r'u po go tsa re na //
translated: the one who has the three

original: aa pra ti k'u lo darsha ni na /
analyzed: aa pra ti k'u lo darsha ni na /
translated: The one who is not to be looked at by the Pratyekabuddhas,

original: aa bhi ra ti: shr'addh'a dhi mukt'a n'am /🔽aan bhi bh'u ta:pra dznya y'a /
analyzed: aa bhi ra ti: shr'addh'a dhi mukt'a n'am / aan bhi bh'u ta:pra dznya y'a /

analyzed: aa na ba marda n'i yo ba lee:/
translated: The one who is not to be crushed by the forces of the enemy,

analyzed: s'arth'a b'a ha a'a di karmi k'a n'am / aa pra me yo dzny'a ne na /

analyzed: aa pra ti sa ma:k'a thams cad kyi ston pa /

analyzed: s'a ga ra banggambh'i ra tsi tta:/ su me nyid kyi spyod yul ba / mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa /

analyzed: smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba /

original: sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa /
translated: He was intent on benefiting all sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mkhas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mkhas pa /
translated: He was skilled in all the domains of the buddhas.

original: ye shes mtha' yas pa /
analyzed: ye shes mtha' yas pa /

original: sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
analyzed: sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /

original: sems rgya mtsho ltar zab pa /🔽sems ri'i ru barba ta r'a dza ba da kampya tsitta:/
analyzed: sems rgya mtsho ltar zab pa / sems ri'i ru barba ta r'a dza ba da kampya tsitta:/
translated: His mind was as deep as the ocean.🔽His mind was like Mount Meru, unshakable.

original: padma ba da nu pa lipta tsitta:/🔽ratna bat+su pa ri shuddha tsitta:/
analyzed: padma ba da nu pa lipta tsitta:/ ratna bat+su pa ri shuddha tsitta:/
translated: His mind was like a lotus, unstained.🔽His mind was like a jewel, completely pure.

original: su barnna bat+su paryab d'a ta tsitta:/
analyzed: su barnna bat+su paryab d'a ta tsitta:/
translated: His mind was like gold, completely refined.

original: aa pa ri mi ta dzny'a na sam bh'a ra parye shan ku sha la:/
analyzed: aa pa ri mi ta dzny'a na sam bh'a ra parye shan ku sha la:/
translated: He was skilled in seeking the accumulation of infinite wisdom.

original: pa ra pra b'a dyan bhi dh'u ta:/
analyzed: pa ra pra b'a dyan bhi dh'u ta:/
translated: He was skilled in the supreme teaching.

original: sarba dharm'a n'a ba ra na dzny'a n'i /🔽rgyal po ri rab ltar mi sgul ba /
analyzed: sarba dharm'a n'a ba ra na dzny'a n'i / rgyal po ri rab ltar mi sgul ba /
translated: He had the wisdom that is the absence of obscurations with regard to all phenomena.🔽His mind was like Mount Meru, unshakable.

original: sems padma ltar mgos pa /🔽sems rin po che ltar shin tu yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: sems padma ltar mgos pa / sems rin po che ltar shin tu yongs su dag pa /
translated: His mind was like a lotus, unstained.🔽His mind was like a jewel, completely pure.

original: sems gser ltar shin tu yongs su byang ba /
analyzed: sems gser ltar shin tu yongs su byang ba /
translated: His mind was like gold, completely refined.

original: ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa /
translated: He was skilled in seeking the accumulation of infinite wisdom.

original: pha rol gyi rgol bas zil gyis mi non pa /
analyzed: pha rol gyi rgol bas zil gyis mi non pa /
translated: He is not overcome by the attacks of others.🔽He has the wisdom that is unobstructed with regard to all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes can /🔽@19b sarba satva sa ma tsitta:/🔽sarba m'a ra bi sha ya sa ma ti kr'anta:/🔽sarba ta th'a ga ta bi sha y'a ba t'a ra dzny'a na ku sha la:/
analyzed: chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes can / @19b sarba satva sa ma tsitta:/ sarba m'a ra bi sha ya sa ma ti kr'anta:/ sarba ta th'a ga ta bi sha y'a ba t'a ra dzny'a na ku sha la:/
translated: He has an attitude of equality toward all beings.🔽He has transcended all the domains of Mara.🔽He is skilled in the knowledge that enters the domain of all tathagatas.

original: ma h'a mee tr'i ma h'a ka ru n'a sa manb'a ga ta:/
analyzed: ma h'a mee tr'i ma h'a ka ru n'a sa manb'a ga ta:/
translated: He is endowed with great love and great compassion.

original: au b'a ya dzny'a na ku sha la:/🔽dh'a ra n'i pra ti labdha:/
analyzed: au b'a ya dzny'a na ku sha la:/ dh'a ra n'i pra ti labdha:/
translated: He is skilled in the knowledge of means.🔽He has attained retention.🔽He has attained the perfection of patience.🔽He has attained the perfection of wisdom.

original: pra ni bh'a n'a kalpi ta:/🔽ksh'anti sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa /
analyzed: pra ni bh'a n'a kalpi ta:/ ksh'anti sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa /
translated: He has attained the perfection of skill in methods.

original: bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /
analyzed: bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /
translated: He has attained the perfection of aspiration.🔽He has attained the perfection of power.🔽He has attained the perfection of knowledge.🔽He has attained the perfection of the vows of the bodhisattvas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the powers of the tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa /
translated: He has attained the perfection of the fearlessnesses of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the unique qualities of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great love of the tathagatas.

original: byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa /
translated: He has attained the perfection of the great compassion of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great joy of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great equanimity of the tathagatas.

original: thabs shes pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: thabs shes pa la mkhas pa /
translated: He has attained the perfection of the great skillful means of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great aspiration of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great strength of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great knowledge of the tathagatas.

original: gzungs thob pa /🔽smon lam ma brtags pa /
analyzed: gzungs thob pa / smon lam ma brtags pa /
translated: He has attained the perfection of the great retention of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great wisdom of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great liberation of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great vision of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great abandonment of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great wisdom of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great skillful means of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the perfection of the great aspiration of the tathagatas.

original: bzod sa ma t'a pra ti labdha:/
analyzed: bzod sa ma t'a pra ti labdha:/
translated: He has attained the perfection of the great strength of the tathagatas.🔽He has attained the

original: aa tsyu t'a bhi dznya:/🔽ni r'a mi sha dharma de sha ka:/
analyzed: aa tsyu t'a bhi dznya:/ ni r'a mi sha dharma de sha ka:/

analyzed: gam bh'i ra dharma ksh'anti p'a ra mim ga ta:/

analyzed: m'a ra karmma sa ma ti kr'anta:/

analyzed: karm'a ba ra na pra ti pra srabdha:/

analyzed: dharmma bra bi tsa ya bi bhakti nirde sha ku sha la:/

analyzed: aa sam pas mnyam pa nyid thob pa /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa / zang zing med par chos ston pa /

analyzed: chos zab mo la bzod pa'i pha rol du son pa /

analyzed: bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'das pa /

analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyun bcad pa /

analyzed: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pas rnam par dbye ba bstan pa la mkhas pa /

original: bskal ba grangs khye ya kalpa pra ni dh'a na su sa m'a rambha:/
analyzed: bskal ba grangs khye ya kalpa pra ni dh'a na su sa m'a rambha:/

original: smi ta mu kha p'urb'a bhi l'a pi:/
analyzed: smi ta mu kha p'urb'a bhi l'a pi:/

analyzed: g'a th'a bhi g'i t'a bhi l'a pa na:/

original: aa pa ga ta l'i na tsitta:/
analyzed: aa pa ga ta l'i na tsitta:/

original: aa n'atstshe dya pra ti bh'a na:/🔽aa nanta ba ri sha da bhi bha ba na:/
analyzed: aa n'atstshe dya pra ti bh'a na:/ aa nanta ba ri sha da bhi bha ba na:/
translated: He is the one who has made the vow of non-action.🔽He is the one who has the power of infinite compassion.

original: aa nanta kalpa ko t'i ni:/🔽sa ra na ku sha la:/🔽m'a y'a med par smon lam shin tu brtsams pa /
analyzed: aa nanta kalpa ko t'i ni:/ sa ra na ku sha la:/ m'a y'a med par smon lam shin tu brtsams pa /
translated: He is the one who has the skill of the infinite eons.🔽He is the one who has the skill of illusion.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the mirage.

original: bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra ba /
analyzed: bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra ba /
translated: He is the one who has the skill of the moon's reflection.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the cloud.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the wish-fulfilling gem.

original: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smra ba /🔽sems zhum pa med pa /🔽spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa /🔽'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smra ba / sems zhum pa med pa / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa / 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa /
translated: He is the one who has the skill of the wish-fulfilling tree.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the universal monarch.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the great ocean.

original: bskal ba bye ba mtha' yas pa las 'byung ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: bskal ba bye ba mtha' yas pa las 'byung ba la mkhas pa /
translated: He is the one who has the skill of the great mountain.

original: sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / @20a * //
analyzed: sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / @20a * //
translated: He is the one who has the skill of the great medicine.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the great friend.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the great hero.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the great charioteer.

original: ma r'i tsi ko da ka tsandra svapna pra ti shr'utk'a pra ti bh'a sa pra ti bimba nirmm'a no pa ma dharmm'a dhi mukta:/🔽aa pra ti ha ta tsitta:/
analyzed: ma r'i tsi ko da ka tsandra svapna pra ti shr'utk'a pra ti bh'a sa pra ti bimba nirmm'a no pa ma dharmm'a dhi mukta:/ aa pra ti ha ta tsitta:/
translated: He is the one who has the skill of the great leader.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the great captain.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the great caravan leader.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the great physician.🔽He is the one who has the skill of the great king.

original: satva tsitta tsa ri ta s'u kshmadzny'a n'a dhi muktya ba t'a ra ku sha la:/
analyzed: satva tsitta tsa ri ta s'u kshmadzny'a n'a dhi muktya ba t'a ra ku sha la:/
translated: He is the one who has the skill of the great minister.🔽He is the one who has the skill of patience.

original: aa dhi m'a tra ksh'anti sa ma nv'a ga ta:/
analyzed: aa dhi m'a tra ksh'anti sa ma nv'a ga ta:/
translated: He is the one who has the skill of the great vehicle.

original: ya th'atmy'a ba t'a ra ku sha la:/
analyzed: ya th'atmy'a ba t'a ra ku sha la:/

original: * // chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos la mos pa /
analyzed: * // chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos la mos pa /
translated: Delighting in the Dharma which is like the moon in water, a dream, an echo, a mirage, a reflection, and an emanation,

original: sems thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: sems thogs pa med pa /

original: sems can kyi sems dang spyod pa shes pa phra mo la mos shing 'jug mkhas pa /
analyzed: sems can kyi sems dang spyod pa shes pa phra mo la mos shing 'jug mkhas pa /
translated: Skilled in entering into the subtle understanding of the minds and conduct of sentient beings,

original: bzod pa chen po dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bzod pa chen po dang ldan pa /

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug mkhas pa /
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug mkhas pa /
translated: Skilled in engaging in accordance with oneself,

original: buddha kshe tra by'u h'a nanta pra ni dh'a na prasth'a na pa ri gri h'i ta:/🔽aa sam khye ya lo ka dh'a tu buddh'a nu smri ti sa m'a dhi sa ta ta sa mi ta aa bhi mu kh'i bh'u ta:/🔽aa pa ri mi ta buddh'a dhye sha na ku sha la:/
analyzed: buddha kshe tra by'u h'a nanta pra ni dh'a na prasth'a na pa ri gri h'i ta:/ aa sam khye ya lo ka dh'a tu buddh'a nu smri ti sa m'a dhi sa ta ta sa mi ta aa bhi mu kh'i bh'u ta:/ aa pa ri mi ta buddh'a dhye sha na ku sha la:/

original: n'a n'a drishty'a nu sha ya sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa mtha' yas par smon pa la 'jug pas yongs su gzung ba /
analyzed: n'a n'a drishty'a nu sha ya sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa mtha' yas par smon pa la 'jug pas yongs su gzung ba /

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par rgyun du mngon du gyur pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par rgyun du mngon du gyur pa /
translated: They were skilled in the constant and continuous manifestation of the samadhi of remembering the buddhas of the incalculable world systems.

original: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs mkhas pa /🔽lta ba tha dad pa dang bag la nyal dang par++ya basth'a na kle sha pra sha ma na ku sha la:/
analyzed: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs mkhas pa / lta ba tha dad pa dang bag la nyal dang par++ya basth'a na kle sha pra sha ma na ku sha la:/
translated: They were skilled in making requests to the immeasurable buddhas.

original: sa m'a dhi bi kr'i di ta sha ta sa ha sra nirh'a ra ku sha la:/🔽sarba dznya t'a nir++y'a ta:/🔽tree dh'a tu k'a sakta:/🔽ga tim ga ta:/🔽sarb'a sh'a pa ri p'u ra ka:/🔽aa pra m'a na sa m'a dhi kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: sa m'a dhi bi kr'i di ta sha ta sa ha sra nirh'a ra ku sha la:/ sarba dznya t'a nir++y'a ta:/ tree dh'a tu k'a sakta:/ ga tim ga ta:/ sarb'a sh'a pa ri p'u ra ka:/ aa pra m'a na sa m'a dhi kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in the pacification of the afflictions of the different views and latent tendencies.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par rol ba brgya stong bsgrub pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par rol ba brgya stong bsgrub pa la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in the accomplishment of the hundred thousand manifestations of samadhi.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung ba /🔽khams gsum la ma chags pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung ba / khams gsum la ma chags pa /
translated: They were skilled in the attainment of omniscience.

original: rtogs par khong du chud pa /
analyzed: rtogs par khong du chud pa /
translated: They were skilled in the attainment of the three realms.🔽They were skilled in the attainment of all the perfections.🔽They were skilled in the attainment of the samadhi of fearlessness.

original: re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba /
analyzed: re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba /

original: ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par @20b sa m'a patti:sa ma nv'a ga ta:/🔽aa mo gha k'a ya b'agm'a naskarmm'ant'a bhi yukta:/🔽aa pra m'a na sa m'a dhi tsary'a dhishthi ta:/
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par @20b sa m'a patti:sa ma nv'a ga ta:/ aa mo gha k'a ya b'agm'a naskarmm'ant'a bhi yukta:/ aa pra m'a na sa m'a dhi tsary'a dhishthi ta:/
translated: who has attained concentration and meditative absorption,

analyzed: na pu narbbo dhi satva ma h'a satva: k'a ma gu nee rlipta:/ sarba sa m'a dhi ba shi t'a p'a ra mim ga ta:/
translated: who is endowed with the activity of body, speech, and mind that is never fruitless,

analyzed: aa nu 'jug pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa /
translated: who is blessed with the practice of immeasurable concentration,🔽who is a bodhisattva, a great being, who is not sullied by the qualities of desire,🔽who has attained the perfection of mastery over all concentrations,🔽who is endowed with immeasurable activity,

original: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' don yod pa la brtson pa /
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' don yod pa la brtson pa /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa tshad med pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
translated: who is blessed with the practice of immeasurable concentration,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis ma gos pa /

translated: He is one who has attained the supreme state of bliss in this very life.

original: yon yongs su sbyong ba chen po /

translated: Great purification of gifts,🔽great calm in conduct,🔽great patience,🔽great gentleness,🔽great purity,🔽great peace,

original: spyod lam rab tu zhi ba phun sampanna:/🔽ma h'a ksh'anti soo ra tya sa ma nv'a ga ta:/
